Test Name: Ustekinumab Quantitation and Anti-Ustekinumab Antibody Detection, Serum
Purpose: To quantify Ustekinumab levels and detect anti-Ustekinumab antibodies in serum to support clinical decision-making.
Container: Red top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA plate reader, microplate washer, centrifuge, refrigerators/freezers, pipettors
